job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: brbrAs an enthusiastic and curious data professional youll have the opportunity to apply your statistics and technical skills to help Garmin Product Support provide superior customer support and aid in our attempt to eliminate customer disruptions entirely  Youll regularly teach leaders about how data might be better leveraged as well as advise decision makers on strategically important issues  All the while youll be able to work with a talented driven and closeknit team based in our Support Center in Olathe KScome join the funbrbrstrongResearch and Technical Expertisebrbrstrong ulliTranslate business problems and questions into appropriate research questions data gathering and statistical analysis methodsli liProvide actionable steps to be taken based off of data analysisli liArticulate the caveats and weaknesses of a given datasetli liUse quantitative skills to answer questions directly posed by business and proactively seek out questions whose answers would benefit the businessli liTransform formulated problems into implementation plans for experiments by applying and creating when necessary the appropriate methods algorithms and tools and statistically validating the results against biases and errors to communicate most effectivelyli brbrulstrongStrives to Make Things Betterbrbrstrong ulliConstantly identify and present opportunities to leverage new or existing data towards monitoring and reducing customer product disruptions and providing superior customer supportli liIs intellectually curious and constantly digging into data to gain a better understandingli liYearns to continually learn new tools skills and conceptsli brbrulstrongSuperior Communication Skillsbrbrstrong ulliConveys complex technical and statistical concepts in an easytounderstand wayli liAdept at evaluating business questions and differentiating between what is interesting versus valuableli liAdept at condensing largescale analysis efforts into succinct easytounderstand visualizations that are actionableli liExcels at collaborating with a team of researchersli liAble to conduct peer reviews in an open honest and respectful mannerli liProvides technical direction mentoring training and guidance to other individual contributors in the groupli liProfessionally approaches situations in which conflict is presentli brbrulstrongValuesbrbrstrong ulliDemonstrates a thorough knowledge of Garmins processes and procedures as they are implemented throughout the companyli liExemplifies Garmins Mission Statement Vision Values and Quality Policy and proactively works to improve Garmins image and culture li liParticipate in project definition activities including feature analysis and system tradeoffsli liPerform other duties as necessaryliul
